body.p:
Office Chief of Police,
Louisville, Ky., Jany 29th 1863.
John W Pruett Esq
Dr Sir

Enclosed I send you the affadavit of Jno Kitts of the firm Kitts & Werne of this City who was robbed on the 14th Inst of Jewels to the amount of Twenty seven hundred dollars, by one Chas. Rodgers and John W. Buckman who have been arrested and are now held in St Louis waiting for the necessary papers under the charge of D. T. Bligh,
Please get the Requisition on the Gov of Missouri for the scoundrels appointing Delos. T. Bligh, the Agent to convey them to this state & oblige,
